tasks.task: Let's start by opening the Solution Explorer. Press Ctrl + Alt + L to open it.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + Alt + L to open the Solution Explorer.

tasks.task: Now, add a new class to your project. Press Ctrl + Shift + A to open the 'Add New Item' dialog.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + Shift + A to open the 'Add New Item' dialog.
tasks.code: // Add New Item dialog opened. Ready to add a new class.

tasks.task: Type 'MyClass.cs' as the name of your new class file and press Enter to add it.
Rename the 'MyClass' class to 'GreetClass'. Select the class name and press F2 to rename it.
tasks.hint: Press F2 to rename the class.

tasks.task: Let's save all the changes. Press Ctrl + Shift + S to save all files in the project.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + Shift + S to save all files.

tasks.task: Run the project to see the output. Press Ctrl + F5 to run the project without debugging.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + F5 to run the project.
